title: Appointment Setter
job_overview:
Start Date: August 4, 2025
Hourly Rate: $3/hour to start + incentives when waitlist goals are met
Work Schedule: Monday to Friday (Weekends off guaranteed)

Role Overview:
We’re seeking a goal-driven Appointment Setter who excels at building genuine connections and sparking interest in our client’s offerings. This is a full-time remote position with performance-based pay growth as you progress.

Responsibilities:
-Send a personalized message to at least 50 prospects per day to build meaningful engagement
-Submit End-of-Day reports (EOD) summarizing outreach activities
-Create conversational and compelling messages that encourage prospects to join the waitlist

Growth Path & Perks:
-Performance-based pay increase
-Incentives awarded for successfully getting prospects on the waitlist
-Supportive team, clear expectations, and room to grow

What We’re Looking For:
-Strong written English and ability to personalize outreach
-Reliable and consistent communicator
-Ability to follow a clear structure while bringing warmth to messages

If you love connecting with people and can turn curiosity into action, this role might be the perfect fit for you. Apply now and help us drive impact—one conversation at a time!

Please email your most updated PDF resume and a 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself and sharing why you're the best fit for this position to Upgrade to see actual info
